<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Idx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If Idx is set, the operands at Idx and Idx+1 must be removed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We reuse the location to avoid expensive removeOperand calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a214e872d61db2ea8cb023f127cafd0b9">DenseMap&lt;Register, AvailableValsTy&gt;::iterator</a> LI =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">          SSAUpdateVals.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemapbase/#a0c047f127ed4380a6f383d70bec4eb94">find</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LI != SSAUpdateVals.end()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This register is defined in the tail block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::pair&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;, Register&gt; &amp;J : LI-&gt;second) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MachineBasicBlock &#42;SrcBB = J.first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we didn&#39;t duplicate a bb into a particular predecessor, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// might still have added an entry to SSAUpdateVals to correcly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// recompute SSA. If that case, avoid adding a dummy extra argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this PHI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SrcBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#adc8f1be4a77ae671ac139d5f06b44deb">isSuccessor</a>(SuccBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/mem2reg-cpp/#a6fde3eb6ca09ddf2fd76432176d817bb">Register</a> SrcReg = J.second;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Idx != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(Idx).setReg(SrcReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(Idx + 1).setMBB(SrcBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Idx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">            MIB.addReg(SrcReg).addMBB(SrcBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Live in tail block, must also be live in predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineBasicBlock &#42;SrcBB : TDBBs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Idx != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(Idx).setReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">            <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(Idx + 1).setMBB(SrcBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Idx = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">            MIB.addReg(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a359e1ff26f6d466d927a61aae45b05c3">Reg</a>).addMBB(SrcBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Idx != 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.removeOperand(Idx + 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.removeOperand(Idx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Determine if it is profitable to duplicate this block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tailduplicator/#aa7dba30d4d9162f00367404e06085391"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/tailduplicator/#aa7dba30d4d9162f00367404e06085391">TailDuplicator::shouldTailDuplicate</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSimple,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;TailBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// When doing tail-duplication during layout, the block ordering is in flux,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// so canFallThrough returns a result based on incorrect information and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should just be ignored.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LayoutMode &amp;&amp; TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a5ffb77c69d69a5beff906caaecfd7be4">canFallThrough</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t try to tail-duplicate single-block loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#adc8f1be4a77ae671ac139d5f06b44deb">isSuccessor</a>(&amp;TailBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Set the limit on the cost to duplicate. When optimizing for size,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicate only one, because one branch instruction can be eliminated to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compensate for the duplication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxDuplicateCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TailDupSize == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxDuplicateCount = <a href="#a18b176a0ede2d73fc8c45ab79e30e66f">TailDuplicateSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxDuplicateCount = TailDupSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3af72f14ea20f2c762c751d2d49e5ea3">llvm::shouldOptimizeForSize</a>(&amp;TailBB, PSI, MBFI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxDuplicateCount = 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the block to be duplicated ends in an unanalyzable fallthrough, don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// duplicate it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A similar check is necessary in MachineBlockPlacement to make sure pairs of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// blocks with unanalyzable fallthrough get layed out contiguously.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;PredTBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, &#42;PredFBB = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineOperand, 4&gt;</a> PredCond;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TII-&gt;analyzeBranch(TailBB, PredTBB, PredFBB, PredCond) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a5ffb77c69d69a5beff906caaecfd7be4">canFallThrough</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the target has hardware branch prediction that can handle indirect</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branches, duplicating them can often make them predictable when there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are common paths through the code.  The limit needs to be high enough</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to allow undoing the effects of tail merging and other optimizations</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that rearrange the predecessors of the indirect branch.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasIndirectbr = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasComputedGoto = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a095ce2d870dadf620a4c887ecc0efef8">empty</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">    HasIndirectbr = TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf35424231192c6b4a3e22d711f50b1e">back</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr/#a19ce3659ba05d62794e306f6d070a850">isIndirectBranch</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    HasComputedGoto = TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a703ba58bd58d60cd76ad205dda1634eb">terminatorIsComputedGoto</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (HasIndirectbr &amp;&amp; PreRegAlloc)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">    MaxDuplicateCount = <a href="#aecc8f70ed265db22955640a6e1aa396b">TailDupIndirectBranchSize</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check the instructions in the block to determine whether tail-duplication</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is invalid or unlikely to be profitable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/dfapacketizer-cpp/#acc16edf21eddec420cd4b27adb3111c6">InstrCount</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumPhis = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : TailBB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Non-duplicable things shouldn&#39;t be tail-duplicated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CFI instructions are marked as non-duplicable, because Darwin compact</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unwind info emission can&#39;t handle multiple prologue setups. In case of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// DWARF, allow them be duplicated, so that their existence doesn&#39;t prevent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// tail duplication of some basic blocks, that would be duplicated otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isNotDuplicable() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acf6442108e21e7e5379feb8962de65b7">getParent</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af777ff93c9e07a6ff5ffe3226deb3e76">getTarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine/#a33fe94054a904130a7c774f78423c8b7">getTargetTriple</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/triple/#ab6fdf9b428bc3d57837022121c155cbf">isOSDarwin</a>() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">        !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isCFIInstruction()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Convergent instructions can be duplicated only if doing so doesn&#39;t add</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// new control dependencies, which is what we&#39;re going to do here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isConvergent())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Do not duplicate &#39;return&#39; instructions if this is a pre-regalloc run.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A return may expand into a lot more instructions (e.g. reload of callee</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// saved registers) after PEI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PreRegAlloc &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isReturn())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid duplicating calls before register allocation. Calls presents a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// barrier to register allocation so duplicating them may end up increasing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spills.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PreRegAlloc &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isCall())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TailDuplicator::appendCopies will erroneously place COPYs after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// INLINEASM&#95;BR instructions after 4b0aa5724fea, which demonstrates the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bug that was fixed in f7a53d82c090.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Use findPHICopyInsertPoint() to find the correct insertion point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        for the COPY when replacing PHIs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == TargetOpcode::INLINEASM&#95;BR)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isBundle())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isMetaInstruction())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    NumPhis += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isPHI();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Duplicating a BB which has both multiple predecessors and successors will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// may cause huge amount of PHI nodes. If we want to remove this limitation,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we have to address https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/issues/78578.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NB. This basically unfactors computed gotos that were factored early on in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the compilation process to speed up edge based data flow. If we do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unfactor them again, it can seriously pessimize code with many computed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// jumps in the source code, such as interpreters. Therefore we do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// restrict the computed gotos.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!HasComputedGoto &amp;&amp; TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a03936a9b37da541420049422204ab206">pred&#95;size</a>() &gt; <a href="#a44220b47eb71fa141e85efc36579ae27">TailDupPredSize</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">      TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a81626de817a0cb021ff8e915cf1942ed">succ&#95;size</a>() &gt; <a href="#a5cbdacc193404b637719f0e857254113">TailDupSuccSize</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If TailBB or any of its successors contains a phi, we may have to add a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// large number of additional phis with additional incoming values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumPhis != 0 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad88ff1529541fb4e243cc8ed90b11131">successors</a>(), &#91;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">          return any&#95;of(&#42;MBB, &#91;&#93;(MachineInstr &amp;MI) &#123; return MI.isPHI(); &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if any of the successors of TailBB has a PHI node in which the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value corresponding to TailBB uses a subregister.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If a phi node uses a register paired with a subregister, the actual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;value type&quot; of the phi may differ from the type of the register without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// any subregisters. Due to a bug, tail duplication may add a new operand</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// without a necessary subregister, producing an invalid code. This is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// demonstrated by test/CodeGen/Hexagon/tail-dup-subreg-abort.ll.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Disable tail duplication for this case for now, until the problem is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fixed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SB : TailBB.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a26e2a938b431eaa6eca2beaa96410c9d">successors</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: This is overly conservative; it may be ok to relax this in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// future under more specific conditions. If TailBB is an INLINEASM&#95;BR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indirect target, we need to see if the edge from PredBB to TailBB is from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// an INLINEASM&#95;BR in PredBB, and then also if that edge was from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// indirect target list, fallthrough/default target, or potentially both. If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it&#39;s both, TailDuplicator::tailDuplicate will remove the edge, corrupting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the successor list in PredBB and predecessor list in TailBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a00e55a6b6b44b739e9da1d62f1d8a5b3">isInlineAsmBrIndirectTarget</a>())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If it is profitable, duplicate TailBB&#39;s contents in each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of its predecessors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p IsSimple result of isSimpleBB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p TailBB   Block to be duplicated.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p ForcedLayoutPred  When non-null, use this block as the layout predecessor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                      instead of the previous block in MF&#39;s order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p TDBBs             A vector to keep track of all blocks tail-duplicated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                      into.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\p Copies            A vector of copy instructions inserted. Used later to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                      walk all the inserted copies and remove redundant ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TailDuplicator::tailDuplicate(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSimple, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;TailBB,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;ForcedLayoutPred,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">                          <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;MachineBasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;TDBBs,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are still tail instructions, abort the merge</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PrevBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a7f0521fa2de44271fd4b909ea7351ef3">getFirstTerminator</a>() == PrevBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PreRegAlloc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">        DenseMap&lt;Register, RegSubRegPair&gt; LocalVRMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, RegSubRegPair&gt;</a>, 4&gt; CopyInfos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process PHI instructions first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>() &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;isPHI()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace the uses of the def of the PHI with the register coming</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MachineInstr &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">          processPHI(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, TailBB, PrevBB, LocalVRMap, CopyInfos, UsedByPhi,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Now copy the non-PHI instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace def of virtual registers with new registers, and update</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MachineInstr &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> = &amp;&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">          duplicateInstruction(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, TailBB, PrevBB, LocalVRMap, UsedByPhi);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">        TII-&gt;removeBranch(&#42;PrevBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No PHIs to worry about, just splice the instructions over.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">        PrevBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#adf0023bdc4f05a7849c35b1c859580d8">splice</a>(PrevBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>(), TailBB, TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ab2d91e7bec944efcbc39d8e30644f111">begin</a>(), TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#acbc921830578e2741be6549db716c0ce">end</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PrevBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa7114bb360b922025e7a4fec442676db">removeSuccessor</a>(PrevBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a6321b189ea8fd5058663f8a87d6c23e9">succ&#95;begin</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PrevBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#aa8d1d8d88835b75b05b14ab774785e8a">succ&#95;empty</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ShouldUpdateTerminators)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;contains terminator instructions&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return early if no changes were made</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is after register allocation, there are no phis to fix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!PreRegAlloc)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we made no changes so far, we are safe.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#gaa57b1a4e6a1c79233913139635169cf1">Changed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Handle the nasty case in that we duplicated a block that is part of a loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// into some but not all of its predecessors. For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    1 -&gt; 2 &lt;-&gt; 3                 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//          \\                      |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//           \\---&gt; rest            |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// if we duplicate 2 into 1 but not into 3, we end up with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 12 -&gt; 3 &lt;-&gt; 2 -&gt; rest           |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   \\             /               |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    \\-----&gt;-----/                |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there was a &quot;var = phi(1, 3)&quot; in 2, it has to be ultimately replaced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with a phi in 3 (which now dominates 2).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// What we do here is introduce a copy in 3 of the register defined by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// phi, just like when we are duplicating 2 into 3, but we don&#39;t copy any</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// real instructions or remove the 3 -&gt; 2 edge from the phi in 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineBasicBlock &#42;PredBB : Preds) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd1cd968cb420c82d70926920fcdc7d7">is&#95;contained</a>(TDBBs, PredBB))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// EH edges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (PredBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a81626de817a0cb021ff8e915cf1942ed">succ&#95;size</a>() != 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">    DenseMap&lt;Register, RegSubRegPair&gt; LocalVRMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;Register, RegSubRegPair&gt;</a>, 4&gt; CopyInfos;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process PHI instructions first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MachineInstr &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a3d2cdc4a0db233678e7141c9d6ea3419">make&#95;early&#95;inc&#95;range</a>(TailBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a36b529ef331e4099007e14b48c75316a">phis</a>())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Replace the uses of the def of the PHI with the register coming</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from PredBB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">      processPHI(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, TailBB, PredBB, LocalVRMap, CopyInfos, UsedByPhi, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    appendCopies(PredBB, CopyInfos, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/siloweri1copies-cpp/#a5cd9e4c7fe1a7ebe8b545eb891a2a949">Copies</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// At the end of the block \\p MBB generate COPY instructions between registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// described by \\p CopyInfos. Append resulting instructions to \\p Copies.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TailDuplicator::appendCopies(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ae34c996b58df9b9ce6695a0c8b70c533">MachineBasicBlock::iterator</a> Loc = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a7f0521fa2de44271fd4b909ea7351ef3">getFirstTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MCInstrDesc &amp;CopyD = TII-&gt;get(TargetOpcode::COPY);</span></CodeLine>
